casebody.data:
Third Department,

November, 1936.

(November 11, 1936.) In the Matter of the Application of Richard Hopkins for Permission to Appeal to the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court, Third Judicial Department, as a Poor Person, in an Action Entitled: County Court — Cortland County. The People of the State of New York v. Richard Hopkins, Defendant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division as a poor person on typewritten papers denied. Present — Hill, P. J., Rhodes, McNamee, Crapser and Bliss, JJ.
